title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 25.14 - Filling vacancies by open competitive examination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 25.14 - Filling vacancies by open competitive examination

State Regulations

The Chief Administrator of the Courts may
conduct an open competitive examination for filling a vacancy or vacancies
instead of a promotion examination. Any employee or employee organization may
submit to the Chief Administrator a request, in writing, for a promotion
examination, rather than an open competitive examination, stating the reasons
why it is practicable and in the public interest to fill the vacancy by
promotion examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
25.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
